pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with President of France Emmanuel Macron | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The President of France, Emmanuel Macron, called Prime Minister Justin Trudeau yesterday evening to express condolences for yesterday's tragic attack in Toronto which resulted in multiple loss of life and injuries. The President reaffirmed the solidarity between France and the people of Canada and offered any assistance that France could provide.
